quote: Even if you stumble and fall down, it doesn't mean you've chosen the wrong path.
author: Zen Proverb

quote: May you live all the days of your life.
author: Jonathan Swift

quote: Never feel shame for trying and failing, for he who has never failed is he who has never tried.
author: Og Mandino

quote: Loss is nothing else but change and change is nature's delight.
author: Marcus Aurelius
